EmailTemplate.name: MRC-DTP Reference
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Reference Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!References__c.Referee_Name__c},
{!References__c.Applicant__c} has applied to undertake the LSTM - Lancaster Medical Research Council Doctoral Training Programme at the Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine and has indicated you as their referee.
This is a gentle reminder to ask for your reference letter which is required by today, 14th January 2016. Interviews have been scheduled for Monday/Tuesday next week and the references form part of the candidate assessment.
References will only be accepted using the attached template. Please type your name in the signature field and upload the reference form using the following link:
{!References__c.Upload_URL__c}
If you are not able to provide a reference for {!References__c.Applicant__c}, we would be grateful you could please notify us by email to mrcdtp@lstmed.ac.uk, stating your reasons.
If you experience any issues, please contact us via email at mrcdtp@lstmed.ac.uk.
Yours sincerely,
MRC DTP Team Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine
